mapper.select: select cst.id, cst.resume_id, rt.title, pit.name , st.skills from company_scrap_tb cst join resume_tb rt on cst.resume_id = rt.id join person_info_tb pit on rt.p_info_id = pit.id join skill_tb st on st.resume_id = rt.id where cst.c_info_id = #{cInfoId}
mapper.insert: insert into company_scrap_tb (c_info_id, resume_id, created_at) values(#{cInfoId}, #{resumeId}, now())
